definition: to piss in one's pants in terror (idiom); scared witless
fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: If you don’t approach things right you can lose your ass.
sentences.chinese: 如果你做事情的方式不對，你會輸得屁滾尿流。

sentences.english: Or should I just beat the shit out of you until you do hear me.
sentences.chinese: 還是要我把你揍得屁滾尿流了才聽得見？

sentences.english: Why are you scared of horror movies? None of them are real.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖電影把我嚇得屁滾尿流。
